mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cash_account(date, proof_id, abstraction, subject_id, debit_money, credit_money) VALUES (#{date}, #{proofId}, #{abstraction}, #{subjectId}, #{debitMoney}, #{creditMoney})
mapper.select: SELECT ca.id AS id, ca.date AS date, ca.proof_id AS proof_id, ca.abstraction AS abstraction, ca.subject_id AS subject_id, ca.debit_money AS debit_money, ca.credit_money AS credit_money FROM cash_account ca RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT id FROM cash_account WHERE date >= #{startDate} AND date <= #{endDate} ORDER BY date ) id_temp ON id_temp.id = ca.id
SELECT SUM(credit_money) AS credit_balance, SUM(debit_money) AS debit_balance FROM cash_account WHERE date < DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
